author: Bloomberg
title: Five more crazy days on Wall Street drag markets back from brink
description: That global markets just had a decent week despite all that can make chronicling their progress seem like a callous undertaking.
content:
By Sam Potter, Anchalee Worrachate and Justina LeeIt’s more than a month since the sell-off began.
In that time, tens of trillions of dollars of value was wiped off global stock gauges, corporate borrowing costs exploded, and access to short-term funding all… [+17787 chars]
